name: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
overview: Play as Flint, the wacky inventor who creates a machine that causes food to rain from the sky! When the machine spirals out of control, it’s up to you to save the town with a variety of outrageously fun and wacky gadgets. Hurl hamburgers, sling spaghetti, and join the most hilarious food fight ever!
